member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.TDS.TransactionIsolationLevelType.ReadUncommited
member.summary: Specifies that statements can read rows that have been modified by other transactions but not yet committed

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.TDS.TransactionIsolationLevelType.ReadCommited
member.summary: Specifies that statements cannot read data that has been modified but not committed by other transactions

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.TDS.TransactionIsolationLevelType.RepeatableRead
member.summary: Specifies that statements cannot read data that has been modified but not yet committed by other transactions and that no other transactions can modify data that has been read by the current transaction until the current transaction completes.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.TDS.TransactionIsolationLevelType.Serializable
member.summary: Specifies that data read by any statement in a transaction will be the transactionally consistent version of the data that existed at the start of the transaction

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.TDS.TransactionIsolationLevelType.Snapshot
member.summary: Statements cannot read data that has been modified but not yet committed by other transactions
